hero.subtitle: Your journey to clean sports starts here

feature1.title: Supplement Verification
feature1.description: Advanced AI-powered analysis of supplement safety and WADA compliance, ensuring athletes' health and fair competition.
feature1.details: Our cutting-edge verification system cross-references global databases, providing instant, comprehensive supplement safety assessments.

feature2.title: Professional Network
feature2.description: Exclusive community platform connecting athletes, coaches, and anti-doping experts worldwide.
feature2.details: Secure, moderated forums for sharing experiences, seeking advice, and building a transparent athletic community.

feature3.title: Compliance Intelligence
feature3.description: AI-driven personal guidance navigating complex anti-doping regulations with precision.
feature3.details: Personalized consultations, real-time regulatory updates, and contextual recommendations tailored to your athletic profile.

feature4.title: Knowledge Ecosystem
feature4.description: Comprehensive, continually updated educational resources on anti-doping standards.
feature4.details: Interactive learning modules, expert-curated content, and multimedia resources exploring ethical sporting practices.

feature5.title: Regulatory Intelligence
feature5.description: Sophisticated tracking and analysis of evolving global anti-doping legislation.
feature5.details: Comprehensive monitoring of international sports governance, providing athletes with authoritative legal insights.

newsletter.title: Stay at the Forefront
newsletter.subtitle: Receive cutting-edge insights, regulatory updates, and exclusive athlete resources
